author: Josh Pukalo
comment: This watch face is perfect is artistic yet simple and accurate it looks good but at the same time entirely functional with a purpose and very accurate this is a must buy!!!
title: Simple yet awesome

author: Nicholas Ordonez
comment: Looks great on my Huawei Watch

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: Glad to hear it is working.

author: Rich Szczepanski
comment: I hoped this watch face would tell me when it was going to get dark (and eventually light) at my location.  Apparently there are several definitions for what dark is and this one displays them all, sacrificing clarity for quantity of information.  It isn't configurable so you're stuck with all three "darks".

author: Leon Washington
comment: I love this watch face! The only thing I would add is battery monitor for the phone.
title: Simple yet elegant

author: keir freeman
comment: Doesn't work on moto 360 sport, constantly crashes on watch.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We have addressed issues with recent watches in version 1.6.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We have addressed issues with recent watches in version 1.6.

author: Ruud Griepsma
comment: The ambient mode looks much better in version 1.5, and its now possible to turn off the battery icon.
title: It's nice!

author: Sorin Lavric
comment: Not what I expected edit: I expect to work like when is the sun up to be a color and for the moon another color...and to work with time, how long is sun up on the summer and so on...

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: I believe you are expecting something that we never promised in our description. We do have another app called Sunlight Watch Face and Widget that does more.

author: Richard Rowsell
comment: Functional and different enough for a change from the norm.  Developer very helpful and responsive to query.
title: Nice.

author: Dan Baker
comment: Really cool concept!  Had a few requests when I first got it and the developer was responsive - looking forward to this being a daily face now.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content:
The sunrise/sunset info is no longer shown in the clean ambient mode. 
You can now toggle off anything that you want as of version 1.5.

author: Keith Sharp
comment: Love the look of the face but really wonder how only 12 hours at a time of sunset or sunrise is useful. If it is 11:30am and want to quickly see when sunset is it still shows sunrise...not useful since I need sunset not a reminder of when sunrise was this morning. Perhaps provide an option to change this to user preference.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We have another watch face called Sunlight with a 24 hour face.

title: Nice face but....

author: Kelsey Evans
comment: Enjoying it so far. Only flaw is having to stay up until midnight to see when the sun is rising. Other than that I really like it.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We do have another watch, Sunlight, that has 24 hour time.

title: Great face for photographers

author: Shabtai Rappoport
comment: Installed it on my moto360 and it shows sunrise at 8:30 am and sunset at 8:50 pm. Time off by more than 2 hours as well as impossible for September anyplace.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: Sorry to hear that. Make sure location is enabled on your phone and Android Wear is allowed to use it. Contact us for a refund if it won't work.

title: Bad Math

author: Jonathan Stansel
comment: Despite waiting ten minutes after installing the app, as well as restarting both my Moto360 and my Nexus 5X, the watch face appeared nowhere and I was unable to switch to it. I am glad I was still able to refund my purchase.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: We do not have any control over how long Android Wear takes to synch with the watch. It can take more than 10 minutes. I do not believe the watch face is defective, nor are we trying to cheat anyone.

title: Unable to switch to watch face after installation

author: Cameron Kilgore

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: It was being automatically added by Google Play Services, so we filtered it out. No hinkiness involved.

title: Explain why you want access to device storage.

author: Matthew Bird
comment: This face is a little cluttered for my liking, it has a lot of potential though needs refining and cleaning up with the ability to select options as well..

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: It does have the ability to choose options through the phone config. Make it as cluttered as you want.

title: Cluttered

author: Jamin Harkness
comment: It doesn't show the right sunrise time and you can't get the battery life icon off the screen.

reply.author: CritterMap Software LLC
reply.content: Sorry to hear that. Make sure location is enabled on your phone and Android Wear is allowed to use it. Contact us for a refund if it won't work.

title: No settings
